metadata.synopsis: VB when the player picks up a flower key in the flophouse after taking the bloody flower key from the shapeshifter's body in the Open Hand Temple.
metadata.how_to_trigger: goto 37; -8; -1013kill the shifters, pick up the bloodied flower key from the body of one of themgoto -13; 43; 78pick up a flower key

0.speaker: Player
0.text: I know this key - it's identical to the one held by that corpse in the tunnels.
